task.summary: Fixed Undefined index: email_address / issue #157 Added option to set custom default image / issue #117
Add option for force Gravatars to be used instead of normal avatars.
Fix gravatar in the member profile summary. Some code changes.
HTTPS for gravatars is enabled for SMF version 2.0.14 and above.

MESSAGE.value: Fixed Undefined index: email_address / issue #157 Added option to set custom default image / issue #117
Add option for force Gravatars to be used instead of normal avatars.
Fix gravatar in the member profile summary. Some code changes.
HTTPS for gravatars is enabled for SMF version 2.0.14 and above.
